sentences.en: Ben has always felt a deep involvement with animals.
sentences.cn: 本对动物总是有着深厚的感情。

sentences.en: Both lungs will have innumerable metastatic foci and lymphangitic involvement.
sentences.cn: 双侧肺内出现无数的转移病灶和淋巴管性播散.

sentences.en: He didn't want any further involvement for fear of retribution.
sentences.cn: 他担心受到惩罚，不想再牵涉其中。

sentences.en: He encourages parental involvement in the running of school.
sentences.cn: 他鼓励学生家长参与学校的管理.

sentences.en: He has denied his involvement [ role ] on the distribution of the profits.
sentences.cn: 他在利润分配问题上把自己说得很 超脱.

sentences.en: He has tried to play down his involvement in the affair.
sentences.cn: 他极力淡化与该事的瓜葛.

sentences.en: He reacted testily to reports that he'd opposed military involvement.
sentences.cn: 有报道称他反对军队参与，对此他很是恼火。

sentences.en: He was found to have a deep involvement in drug dealing.
sentences.cn: 有人发现他与毒品贩卖牵涉很深.

sentences.en: His involvement in the scandal was a blot on his reputation.
sentences.cn: 他因卷入丑闻,在名誉上留下污点.

sentences.en: My involvement has not been altogether, shall we say, ethical.
sentences.cn: 可以说，我的参与还不是完全合乎道德。

sentences.en: Occasionally, recurrent laryngeal nerve involvement causes hoarseness.
sentences.cn: 有时, 喉返神经受累引起声音嘶哑.

sentences.en: One of the main themes of TQM is employee involvement.
sentences.cn: 全面质量管理的主题之一是员工参与。

sentences.en: Peace and stability in the world need the active involvement of China.
sentences.cn: 世界和平和稳定需有中国的积极参与.

sentences.en: School officials say they welcome parental involvement.
sentences.cn: 校方说他们欢迎学生父母参与。

sentences.en: She disliked his involvement with the group and disliked his friends.
sentences.cn: 她不喜欢他与那帮人交往，也不喜欢他的朋友。

sentences.en: The Foreign Ministry has issued a flat denial of any involvement.
sentences.cn: 外交部已经坚决否认参与过此事。

words.tran_cn: 涉及；使参与；包含（involve的过去式和过去分词）
包含；牵涉；使陷于；潜心于

phrases.tran_cn: 工作投入；职务参与；工作认同

trans.tran_cn: 牵连，参与，加入，财政困难，牵连的事务，复杂的情况
trans.tran_en: the act of taking part in an activity or event, or the way in which you take part in it
